<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference in Paris. Event: Honeywell Operators Conference
Date: June 18, 2018
Location: AC Hotel Paris Le Bourget Airport, 2 Rue de la Haye, 93440 Dugny Le Bourget
Please contact us at Anna.Tomova@honeywell.com with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
